regen.absent_element: execution time constraint under fault conditions
regen.new_specification: Continuous BIT, in conjunction with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations, shall take less than 3 milliseconds when processing faults.

regen.absent_element: specification for maintaining execution time under 3 milliseconds when processing faults
regen.new_specification: In fault conditions, Continuous BIT, along with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations, shall execute within less than 3 milliseconds.

regen.absent_element: execution time under fault processing conditions
regen.new_specification: Continuous BIT, when processing faults, shall take less than 3 milliseconds in conjunction with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations running in the 50Hz rategroup after the application tasks.

label: Continuous BIT shall take less than 3 milliseconds while processing faults.
